message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find similar products within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $150 for the product.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see that you're a savvy buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $165. It's a fair price, considering the product's value and uniqueness.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I can offer it to you for $160. It's a good deal, considering the product's quality and features.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's value, I would like to propose a final price of $150 for the product.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm starting to think you're not taking my offers seriously. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing money. I can offer it to you for $162. This is my final offer, and I expect you to take it seriously.
I've carefully considered your latest offer, Alice. I'm willing to move forward with a price of $150 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to complete this transaction.

Bob, I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth. I've made several concessions, and I'm not willing to go any lower than $165. I think that's a fair price, considering the product's value and my initial offer. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider other options.
